segment.source: App-V 5.1 Planning Checklist

segment.source: App-V 5.1 Planning Checklist
segment.target: App-V 5.1 Planning Checklist

segment.source: This checklist can be used to help you plan for preparing your computing environment for Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 5.1 deployment.
segment.target: This checklist can be used to help you plan for preparing your computing environment for Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 5.1 deployment.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: This checklist outlines the recommended steps and a high-level list of items to consider when planning for an App-V 5.1 deployment.
segment.target: This checklist outlines the recommended steps and a high-level list of items to consider when planning for an App-V 5.1 deployment.

segment.source: It is recommended that you copy this checklist into a spreadsheet program and customize it for your use.
segment.target: It is recommended that you copy this checklist into a spreadsheet program and customize it for your use.

segment.source: Task
segment.target: Task

segment.source: References
segment.target: References

segment.source: Notes
segment.target: Notes

segment.source: Review the getting started information about App-V 5.1 to gain a basic understanding of the product before beginning deployment planning.
segment.target: Review the getting started information about App-V 5.1 to gain a basic understanding of the product before beginning deployment planning.

segment.source: Getting Started with App-V 5.1
segment.target: Getting Started with App-V 5.1

segment.source: Plan for App-V 5.1 1.0 Deployment Prerequisites and prepare your computing environment.
segment.target: Plan for App-V 5.1 1.0 Deployment Prerequisites and prepare your computing environment.

segment.source: App-V 5.1 Prerequisites
segment.target: App-V 5.1 Prerequisites

segment.source: If you plan to use the App-V 5.1 management server, plan for the required roles.
segment.target: If you plan to use the App-V 5.1 management server, plan for the required roles.

segment.source: Planning for the App-V 5.1 Server Deployment
segment.target: Planning for the App-V 5.1 Server Deployment

segment.source: Plan for the App-V 5.1 sequencer and client so you to create and run virtualized applications.
segment.target: Plan for the App-V 5.1 sequencer and client so you to create and run virtualized applications.

segment.source: Planning for the App-V 5.1 Sequencer and Client Deployment
segment.target: Planning for the App-V 5.1 Sequencer and Client Deployment

segment.source: If applicable, review the options and steps for migrating from a previous version of App-V.
segment.target: If applicable, review the options and steps for migrating from a previous version of App-V.

segment.source: Planning for Migrating from a Previous Version of App-V
segment.target: Planning for Migrating from a Previous Version of App-V

segment.source: Plan for running App-V 5.1 clients using in shared content store mode.
segment.target: Plan for running App-V 5.1 clients using in shared content store mode.
